name: MP3 Burning Preparer (mbp)
short_description: mbp reads mp3 files from a directory, sorts them, based on a supplied criteria, reads mp3 play time length and backpacks them by trying to fit as much playing time into each cd as possible, then copies/moves them to new directories it creates.
